00052 namespace {
00053 
00054   const char *usage =
00055     "usage: write_test [options] <total-bytes>\n\n"
00056     "Description:\n"
00057     "  This program will generate various types of write worload"
00058     "  for testing purposes.";
00059 
00060   struct AppPolicy : Config::Policy {
00061     static void init_options() {
00062       cmdline_desc(usage).add_options()
00063         ("max-keys", i64()->default_value(0),
00064             "Maximum number of unique keys to generate")
00065         ("key-size", i32()->default_value(12), "Size of each key")
00066         ("value-size", i32()->default_value(1000), "Size of each value")
00067         ("seed", i32()->default_value(1234),
00068             "Pseudo random number generator seed")
00069         ;
00070       cmdline_hidden_desc().add_options()("total-bytes", i64(), "");
00071       cmdline_positional_desc().add("total-bytes", -1);
00072     }
00073   };
00074 
00075   typedef Meta::list<AppPolicy, DefaultPolicy, CommPolicy> Policies;
00076 }
00077 
00078 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00079   ClientPtr hypertable_client;
00080   TablePtr table;
00081   TableMutatorPtr mutator;
00082   KeySpec key;
00083   boost::shared_array<char> value_data;
00084   boost::shared_array<char> key_data;
00085   char *valuep;
00086 
00087   init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00088 
00089   uint64_t total = get_i64("total-bytes");
00090   uint64_t max_keys = get_i64("max-keys");
00091   uint32_t value_size = get_i32("value-size");
00092   uint32_t key_size = get_i32("key-size");
00093   uint32_t seed = get_i32("seed");
00094 
00095   size_t R = total / value_size;
00096 
00097   if (max_keys == 0)
00098     max_keys = R;
00099 
00100   uint32_t key_offset;
00101   uint32_t max_key_offset = (max_keys * key_size) - key_size;
00102 
00103   srandom(seed);
00104   Random::seed(seed);
00105 
00106   key_data.reset( new char [ max_keys * key_size ] );
00107   Random::fill_buffer_with_random_ascii(key_data.get(), max_keys * key_size);
00108 
00109   value_data.reset( new char [ R + value_size ] );
00110   Random::fill_buffer_with_random_ascii(value_data.get(), R + value_size);
00111 
00112   try {
00113     hypertable_client = new Hypertable::Client();
00114 
00115     table = hypertable_client->open_table("RandomTest");
00116 
00117     mutator = table->create_mutator();
00118   }
00119   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00120     cerr << e << endl;
00121     _exit(1);
00122   }
00123 
00124   key.column_family = "Field";
00125 
00126   char *row_key = new char [ key_size + 1 ];
00127   key.row_len = key_size;
00128   key.row = row_key;
00129   row_key[key.row_len] = '\0';
00130 
00131   Stopwatch stopwatch;
00132 
00133   {
00134     boost::progress_display progress_meter(R);
00135 
00136     try {
00137       valuep = value_data.get();
00138 
00139       for (size_t i = 0; i < R; ++i) {
00140 
00141         key_offset = random() % (max_key_offset + 1);
00142         memcpy(row_key, key_data.get()+key_offset, key_size);
00143 
00144         mutator->set(key, valuep, value_size);
00145 
00146         valuep++;
00147 
00148         progress_meter += 1;
00149 
00150       }
00151       mutator->flush();
00152     }
00153     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00154       mutator->show_failed(e, cerr);
00155       _exit(1);
00156     }
00157   }
00158 
00159   stopwatch.stop();
00160 
00161   double total_written = (double)total + (double)(R*12);
00162   printf("  Elapsed time:  %.2f s\n", stopwatch.elapsed());
00163   printf(" Total inserts:  %llu\n", (Llu)R);
00164   printf("    Throughput:  %.2f bytes/s\n",
00165          total_written / stopwatch.elapsed());
00166   printf("    Throughput:  %.2f inserts/s\n",
00167          (double)R / stopwatch.elapsed());
00168   fflush(stdout);
00169   _exit(0);
00170 }
